column4: Is it just me or is tab completion absolutely useless on 11.04? - like, if you're trying to dig down a long directory tree.  Like. ls -l /v<tab> yields "/var " so you can't do /v<tab>/li<tab>/cl<tab>
you have to keep hitting backspace and correcting
does anyone know where the bash settings to fix this behaviour are? :)
I'm trying to replicate your <tab> problem, no impact here
